title: Colorblind problems with Blood Moon Twisted Fate

embed.description: https://i.imgur.com/UbFjNmq.png Destiny sees blood in the heavens. His cards deal blood on the earth. Note: Blood Moon Twisted Fate's recall VFX is still unfinished; he should be walking into a spooky portal! Ritual Items Completely new model! (a hooded assassin!) New VFX! (spooky Destiny eye!)

body:
I can't comment to PBE Boards since I don't have a PBE account, but I'm colorblind and I can't see BM TF's E ability at all. The symbols are so hard to see for me. I'm also a TF main so I would love to see them. :) Change them to visible cards or something. Thank you.
-Khada Fate {{champion:4}}

replies.body: Hey! Thank you so much for posting this. We do try to balance as best we can for colorblind players! I'm following up this morning with the pod to see what adjustments could be made to make this a bit more visible. :)

Could you also take a look at the Veigar's W being invisible to colorblind peope problem? I've been trying to attract riot's attention for months...
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/nTNl2pGW-omega-squad-veigars-w-colorblind-people-unite

Hey! Sure thing. Sorry this was overlooked. I loaded this up in Photoshop and used the Proof Setup with preset colorblind filters, and I agree that it's rough to see if you're colorblind. I caught up with one of our VFX artists this morning and he's going to look into this. We've got a bug in for tracking.
about tf, any thought about pullsfire skin, everyone seems to agree that the visual are very hard to see, colorblind or not

Yeah, of course! This is a pretty major issue! I caught up with the VFX artist, and we pushed a fix in, and you should see this on PBE today! Would you mind taking a look and letting me know if it's something that works for you? 

**Colorblind Photoshop filter applied (before v. after) - ** 

https://imgur.com/a/unX51

**Updated in-game - **

https://imgur.com/a/HyDzV
That's so much better now, thanks :)
Ahhh, okay cool! I'm glad this works! ^-^ Thanks again for pointing it out! <3
As someone else who is colorblind.  I just assumed it was very hard to see for everyone T.T
